mapper.sql: LOCNO, OWNER_NO, DELIVER_NO, CONTAINER_NO, CONTAINER_ID, EXP_TYPE, EXP_NO, LOCATE_NO, ITEM_NO, SUPPLIER_NO, BARCODE, PACK_QTY, LOT_NO, PRODUCE_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, QUALITY, IMPORT_BATCH_NO, BATCH_SERIAL_NO, EXT_BARCODE_NO, QTY, CREATOR,CREATORNAME, CREATETM, EDITOR,EDITORNAME, EDITTM, ITEM_ID, ITEM_TYPE, EXP_DATE, STATUS, REAL_QTY, ROW_ID, BOX_NO, VOLUME, WEIGHT, STORE_NO,SIZE_NO, LINE_NO, M3_TRANS_STATUS
mapper.select:
select count(1) as s from ( select d.LOCNO, d.OWNER_NO, d.DELIVER_NO, d.BOX_NO, d.Store_No, d.ITEM_NO, d.SIZE_NO, MAX(i1.item_name) as item_name, MAX(s1.store_name) as store_name, s1.CIRCLE_NO, (select c.CIRCLE_NAME from BM_CIRCLE c where c.CIRCLE_NO = s1.CIRCLE_NO and c.locno = d.locno and rownum = 1) as CIRCLE, sum(d.qty) qty, d.LOADPROPOSE_NO, (select lp.TMS_DELIVER_NO from BILL_OM_LOADPROPOSE lp where lp.locno = d.locno and lp.LOADPROPOSE_NO = d.LOADPROPOSE_NO) as tmsDeliverNo from BILL_OM_DELIVER_DTL d LEFT join item i1 on i1.item_no = d.item_no LEFT join store s1 on s1.store_no = d.Store_No where 1 = 1
group by d.LOCNO, d.OWNER_NO, d.DELIVER_NO, d.BOX_NO, d.Store_No, d.ITEM_NO, d.SIZE_NO, s1.CIRCLE_NO, d.LOADPROPOSE_NO ) A

select
from BILL_OM_DELIVER_DTL d where 1=1

select d.item_no itemNo, d.size_no sizeNo, d.store_no storeNo, max(st.store_name) storeName, sum(d.qty) qty, max(s.size_kind) sizeKind, max(s.size_code) sizeCode, substr(d.brand_no, 0, 2) sysNo from bill_om_deliver_dtl d inner join item i on i.item_no = d.item_no inner join size_info s on s.sys_no = substr(d.brand_no, 0, 2) and s.size_no = d.size_no and s.size_kind = i.size_kind left join store st on d.store_no = st.store_no where 1=1 and d.deliver_no = #{deliverNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by d.LOCNO, d.OWNER_NO, d.DELIVER_NO, d.Store_No, d.ITEM_NO, d.SIZE_NO, d.LOADPROPOSE_NO, d.brand_no
mapper.insert: insert into BILL_OM_DELIVER_DTL (LOCNO, OWNER_NO, DELIVER_NO, CONTAINER_NO, CONTAINER_ID, EXP_TYPE, EXP_NO, LOCATE_NO, ITEM_NO, SUPPLIER_NO, BARCODE, PACK_QTY, LOT_NO, PRODUCE_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, QUALITY, IMPORT_BATCH_NO, BATCH_SERIAL_NO, EXT_BARCODE_NO, QTY, CREATOR, CREATORNAME, CREATETM, EDITOR,EDITORNAME, EDITTM, ITEM_ID, ITEM_TYPE, EXP_DATE, STATUS, REAL_QTY, ROW_ID, BOX_NO, VOLUME, WEIGHT, STORE_NO, LINE_NO, M3_TRANS_STATUS, BRAND_NO ) values (#{locno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{containerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{containerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{expType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lotNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{produceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{quality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{importBatchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extBarcodeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creatorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{editorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{edittm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{realQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rowId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{boxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{storeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{m3TransStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{brandNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

LOCNO,

mapper.update:
update BILL_OM_DELIVER_DTL
EXP_TYPE = #{expType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXP_NO = #{expNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOCATE_NO = #{locateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_NO = #{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_NO = #{supplierNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BARCODE = #{barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PACK_QTY = #{packQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOT_NO = #{lotNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCE_DATE = #{produceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
QUALITY = #{quality,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMPORT_BATCH_NO = #{importBatchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BATCH_SERIAL_NO = #{batchSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXT_BARCODE_NO = #{extBarcodeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATORNAME = #{creatorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETM = #{createtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EDITOR = #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDITORNAME = #{editorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDITTM = #{edittm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ITEM_TYPE = #{itemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXP_DATE = #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
REAL_QTY = #{realQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ROW_ID = #{rowId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BOX_NO = #{boxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VOLUME = #{volume,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STORE_NO = #{storeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINE_NO = #{lineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
M3_TRANS_STATUS = #{m3TransStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
LOADPROPOSE_NO = #{loadproposeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where LOCNO = #{locno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and OWNER_NO = #{ownerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DELIVER_NO = #{deliverNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and CONTAINER_NO = #{containerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and CONTAINER_ID = #{containerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update BILL_OM_DELIVER_DTL set EXP_TYPE = #{expType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXP_NO = #{expNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCATE_NO = #{locateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_NO = #{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIER_NO = #{supplierNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BARCODE = #{barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PACK_QTY = #{packQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOT_NO = #{lotNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCE_DATE = #{produceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, QUALITY = #{quality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMPORT_BATCH_NO = #{importBatchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BATCH_SERIAL_NO = #{batchSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT_BARCODE_NO = #{extBarcodeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATORNAME = #{creatorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETM = #{createtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EDITOR = #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDITORNAME = #{editorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDITTM = #{edittm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ITEM_TYPE = #{itemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXP_DATE = #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, REAL_QTY = #{realQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ROW_ID = #{rowId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BOX_NO = #{boxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VOLUME = #{volume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STORE_NO = #{storeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINE_NO = #{lineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, M3_TRANS_STATUS = #{m3TransStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, LOADPROPOSE_NO = #{loadproposeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where LOCNO = #{locno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and OWNER_NO = #{ownerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DELIVER_NO = #{deliverNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CONTAINER_NO = #{containerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CONTAINER_ID = #{containerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.sql:
select t1.locno, t1.recheck_no, t1.container_no, t1.brand_no, t2.scan_label_no as label_no, r.store_no, s.store_name, c1.circle_name as circle, t1.exp_no, t1.owner_no, t1.item_no, t1.size_no, t1.real_qty as qty, ib.barcode,ib.sys_no, (select im.SUPPLIER_NO from item im where im.item_no=t1.item_no) as SUPPLIER_NO from bill_om_recheck r inner join bill_om_recheck_dtl t1 on r.locno = t1.locno and r.recheck_no = t1.recheck_no
and t1.brand_no in
inner join (select td2.locno, td2.recheck_no from bill_om_recheck_dtl td2 where 1 = 1
and td2.locno = #{params.locno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and td2.exp_no = #{params.expNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
group by td2.locno, td2.recheck_no) t2 on r.locno = t2.locno and r.recheck_no = t2.recheck_no
left join con_label t2 on t2.locno = r.locno and t2.container_no = t1.container_no left join store s on s.store_no = r.store_no left join bm_circle c1 on c1.circle_no = s.circle_no and c1.locno = r.locno left join item_barcode ib on ib.size_no=t1.size_no and ib.item_no=t1.item_no and ib.pack_qty=1 and ib.package_id = 0 where 1 = 1 and t1.status = '14' and not exists (select tt2.container_no, tt2.box_no, tt2.item_no, tt2.store_no, tt2.qty, tt2.size_no from bill_om_deliver_dtl tt2 where 1 = 1 and t1.locno = tt2.locno and t1.container_no = tt2.container_no and t2.scan_label_no = tt2.box_no and r.store_no = tt2.store_no and t1.item_no = tt2.item_no and t1.size_no = tt2.size_no)

select t1.locno, t1.loadpropose_no, t1.container_no, t1.container_type, t1.status, t1.store_no, t1.load_order, t1.exp_no,t2.tms_deliver_no, t1.exp_date, t3.scan_label_no as label_no, t4.item_no, t4.size_no,t1.brand_no, t4.pack_qty, t4.qty, tm.barcode, s.store_name, s.circle,c1.circle_name from bill_om_loadpropose_dtl t1 inner join bill_om_loadpropose t2 on t1.locno = t2.locno and t1.loadpropose_no = t2.loadpropose_no
inner join (select td2.locno, td2.loadpropose_no from bill_om_loadpropose_dtl td2 where 1 = 1
and td2.locno = #{params.locno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and td2.exp_no = #{params.expNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
group by td2.locno, td2.loadpropose_no) td2 on t1.locno = td2.locno and t1.loadpropose_no = td2.loadpropose_no
inner join con_label t3 on t3.locno = t1.locno and t1.container_no = t3.container_no and t1.container_type = t3.container_type inner join con_label_dtl t4 on t1.locno = t4.locno and t1.container_no = t4.container_no and t1.container_type = t4.container_type left join store s on s.store_no = t1.store_no left join bm_circle c1 on c1.circle_no = s.circle and c1.locno = t2.locno inner join item_barcode tm on t4.item_no = tm.item_no and t4.size_no = tm.size_no and tm.package_id = '0' where 1 = 1 and t1.status = '10'
and t1.brand_no in
and not exists (select tt2.locno, tt2.container_no, tt2.box_no, tt2.store_no, tt2.item_no, tt2.size_no, tt2.qty from bill_om_deliver_dtl tt2 where 1 = 1 and tt2.locno = t1.locno and tt2.container_no = t1.container_no and tt2.box_no = t3.scan_label_no and tt2.store_no = t1.store_no and tt2.item_no = t4.item_no and tt2.size_no = t4.size_no)
mapper.select:

)

) A where rownum < #{page.endRowNum}) B where rn > #{page.startRowNum}
